faqs.question: Can I negotiate the Orchard offer?
faqs.answer: Our goal is to make selling simple and streamlined by giving you a fair, competitive offer without the uncertainty of negotiations. However, if you believe we missed an important detail about your home, let us know by emailing us at support@orchardhomes.com. Our team will review the new information to see a revised offer is warranted.

faqs.question: Is Orchard a home flipper?
faqs.answer:
No, unlike home flippers who buy distressed homes at a deep discount, Orchard only buys homes in good condition and pays fair prices based on its valuation of the home.

Orchard can also pair you with a licensed local real estate agent to list your home, so you can test the market to get the highest possible price before accepting our cash offer.

faqs.question: Where does Orchard operate?
faqs.answer:
We currently serve customers in:

  • Atlanta, GA

  • Austin, TX

  • Dallas-Fort Worth, TX

  • Denver, CO

  • San Antonio, TX

You can work with Orchard to buy your dream home without contingencies and sell your current home for market price. Orchard also works with customers that are only looking to sell, allowing them to sell without showings, repairs, or hassle.
